title: namaidani
author: namaidani
content: Experience the innovation of Pay NaMaidani, a cutting-edge payment platform that offers a wide range of services, including automatic cryptocurrency exchange. With us, you can seamlessly exchange various cryptocurrencies like: BTCBitcoin, Litecoin, DOGE, Ethereum, Binance, Bitcoin Cash, Tether ERC-20, USD Coin ERC20 and others BTConPAYPAL, Bank Account or other Cryptocurrency.And also automatic exchange: BTCPAYPAL, Payeer, Visa, Bank AccountonBitcoin, Litecoin, DOGE, Ethereum, Binance, Bitcoin Cash, Tether ERC-20, USD Coin ERC20 and others.BTCWith Pay NaMaidani platform, you can enjoy profitable exchange rates, simplicity, and lightning-fast transactions. Say goodbye to middlemen and their high commissions that eat into your hard-earned money.For seamless integration into your business, we offer an API for payment integration on other websites and a ready-made plugin for WordPress (Woocommerce) and other commerce platforms. Take control of your transactions with Pay NaMaidani and experience financial freedom like never before.Join https://pay.namaidani.com today and break free from unnecessary expenses! BTC

comments.author: ICYNOTE2023
comments.body: can you share about rates here?? because everyone want know before they will making exchange.

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: Quote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 24, 2023, 02:37:50 PMcan you share about rates here?? because everyone want know before they will making exchange.  If you go to the site and check the rates yourself, then it is free and there is no charge for it, and it is without registration on the main page - select the exchange of cryptocurrency and the direction of buying a dollar for the chosen cryptocurrency.But according to the topic about exchanging PAYPAL for cryptocurrency. The tariffs are as follows:When replenishing the balance, there is no commission, that is, you replenish $ 100, you get $ 100, the replenishment can be from PAYPAL or from other available directions. There is also no commission between users in the payment system itself. Now, when exchanging $100 for cryptocurrency, the fee is 0.75% + $0.50. BTC

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: Quote from: Wild-West.Trade on August 04, 2023, 09:57:04 AMQuote from: namaidani on July 27, 2023, 08:26:42 AMQuote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 24, 2023, 02:37:50 PMcan you share about rates here?? because everyone want know before they will making exchange.  If you go to the site and check the rates yourself, then it is free and there is no charge for it, and it is without registration on the main page - select the exchange of cryptocurrency and the direction of buying a dollar for the chosen cryptocurrency.But according to the topic about exchanging PAYPAL for cryptocurrency. The tariffs are as follows:When replenishing the balance, there is no commission, that is, you replenish $ 100, you get $ 100, the replenishment can be from PAYPAL or from other available directions. There is also no commission between users in the payment system itself. Now, when exchanging $100 for cryptocurrency, the fee is 0.75% + $0.50. BTCThere is no way to tell what the exchange rate for Paypal to bitcoin is on the website - atleast not without signing up and doing kyc first.Could you please give a roughly estimate of what the rates are right now here? You must be inattentive or you haven't visited the site. On the main page, in the crypto exchange section of the top menu, at the link pay.namaidani.com/crypto-exchange/create, you can clearly see the exchange rate without registration, for example, dollar bitcoin. When topping up your balance through PayPal, for example $100, you will receive $100 in your balance. For exchange, of course, you need to go through a simple registration and kyc for cryptocurrencies is not essential.

comments.author: zencrew
comments.body: hello, where can i find reviews about your exchange?

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: Quote from: zencrew on October 28, 2023, 07:35:39 PMhello, where can i find reviews about your exchange? Thank you for your interest in the exchange, which has been operating for almost a year, although the company has been on the market for 10 years. You can check for yourself that during this time there is no negative feedback about the exchanger. BTCAlso, when exchanging, buying or selling cryptocurrency, please register on the site and carry out any operations, and do not buy, sell or exchange cryptocurrency without registration, because if an invalid address is specified, you can lose your funds. BTC

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: The Pay NaMaidani payment system for users, among others, also offers investment plans for cryptocurrency, including Bitcoin, Litecoin, DOGE, Ethereum, Binance, Bitcoin Cash, SOL, TRX, MATIC and others at 14% for a period of 90 days with daily interest payments of cryptocurrency to the user's balance. For those who are waiting for a good rate that grows to sell their cryptocurrency - Pay NaMaidani investment plans will help multiply your funds in cryptocurrency with a good interest rate. BTC

comments.author: namaidani
comments.body: On the occasion of the release of our NaMaidani Token NAD to all users who take advantage of any of our investment plans Pay NaMaidani, we will credit your account with our NaMaidani Token NAD equivalent to this amount, but not more than $1000.
